content:
The defense forces of the south of Ukraine destroyed two felds of ammunition and the place of storage of fuel and lubricants of the enemy.

This is stated inmessageIn the channel telegram.

During the day, the defenders eliminated 117 invaders in the south, destroyed one tank and two guns, including anti -tank.

5 enemy mortars, a portable complex of electronic wrestling, a CCTV complex of "Mur-M" and 11 units of cars and armored vehicles were also destroyed.

"The defense forces continue to inflict fire damage on enemy deployments, firing positions and rear," the message says.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the past day the enemycarried out3 Attempts of storms on the Left Bank of the Dnieper and 7 - in the area of the robot in Zaporizhzhia region.
title: Defense forces destroyed in the south two ammunition points and 11 units of enemy equipment
description: This is stated in a message in a telegram. During the day, defenders eliminated ...
author: Army Inform
